instruction: In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, and baking powder. Add eggs and milk, then fold in chocolate chips. Cook on a griddle until golden brown.
Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger until golden. Add tomatoes, spices, and chickpeas. Simmer until chickpeas are tender.
Sauté shrimp in garlic and butter. Add lemon juice and cilantro. Cook until shrimp are opaque.
Blend mangoes, bananas, yogurt, and milk until smooth.
Sauté chicken, garlic, and tomatoes. Add basil. Toss with cooked pasta.
Fry fish in mustard oil with turmeric powder. Cook onions and garlic, then add the fried fish.
Sauté onions, garlic, and cumin seeds. Add potatoes, lentils, and water. Simmer until potatoes are tender.
Brew tea leaves in milk. Add sugar and vanilla extract. Strain and serve.
Brown beef, onions, and garlic. Add potatoes and bay leaves. Simmer until beef and potatoes are cooked.
Marinate chicken in lime juice and cilantro. Grill and serve in tortillas with onions and green chilies.
